wesm commented on issue #2407: ARROW-3026: [Python] [Plasma] Only run Plasma unit tests with valgrind under Python 3.6
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2407#issuecomment-411630312
 
 
   Turning off valgrind doesn't seem to be working
   
   Python 2.7 (supposedly valgrind disabled):
   
   ```
   ========================== slowest 15 test durations ===========================
   5.36s call     pyarrow/tests/test_plasma.py::TestPlasmaClient::test_subscribe_deletions
   5.10s call     pyarrow/tests/test_plasma_tf_op.py::test_plasma_tf_op
   4.24s call     pyarrow/tests/test_cython.py::test_cython_api
   3.86s call     pyarrow/tests/test_plasma.py::TestPlasmaClient::test_subscribe
   2.29s call     pyarrow/tests/test_plasma.py::TestPlasmaClient::test_get
   2.15s call     pyarrow/tests/test_feather.py::TestFeatherReader::test_buffer_bounds_error
   1.67s call     pyarrow/tests/test_plasma.py::TestPlasmaClient::test_many_hashes
   1.67s call     pyarrow/tests/test_parquet.py::test_decimal_roundtrip
   1.21s call     pyarrow/tests/test_plasma.py::TestPlasmaClient::test_create_existing
   1.21s call     pyarrow/tests/test_plasma.py::TestPlasmaClient::test_use_one_memory_mapped_file
   1.15s call     pyarrow/tests/test_plasma.py::TestPlasmaClient::test_create_with_metadata
   0.84s call     pyarrow/tests/test_serialization.py::test_deserialize_buffer_in_different_process
   0.49s call     pyarrow/tests/test_array.py::test_to_pandas_zero_copy
   0.42s call     pyarrow/tests/test_parquet.py::test_pandas_parquet_configuration_options
   0.38s setup    pyarrow/tests/test_jvm.py::test_jvm_buffer
   ```
   
   Python 3.6:
   
   ```
   ========================== slowest 15 test durations ===========================
   5.36s call     pyarrow/tests/test_plasma.py::TestPlasmaClient::test_subscribe_deletions
   5.10s call     pyarrow/tests/test_plasma_tf_op.py::test_plasma_tf_op
   4.24s call     pyarrow/tests/test_cython.py::test_cython_api
   3.86s call     pyarrow/tests/test_plasma.py::TestPlasmaClient::test_subscribe
   2.29s call     pyarrow/tests/test_plasma.py::TestPlasmaClient::test_get
   2.15s call     pyarrow/tests/test_feather.py::TestFeatherReader::test_buffer_bounds_error
   1.67s call     pyarrow/tests/test_plasma.py::TestPlasmaClient::test_many_hashes
   1.67s call     pyarrow/tests/test_parquet.py::test_decimal_roundtrip
   1.21s call     pyarrow/tests/test_plasma.py::TestPlasmaClient::test_create_existing
   1.21s call     pyarrow/tests/test_plasma.py::TestPlasmaClient::test_use_one_memory_mapped_file
   1.15s call     pyarrow/tests/test_plasma.py::TestPlasmaClient::test_create_with_metadata
   0.84s call     pyarrow/tests/test_serialization.py::test_deserialize_buffer_in_different_process
   0.49s call     pyarrow/tests/test_array.py::test_to_pandas_zero_copy
   0.42s call     pyarrow/tests/test_parquet.py::test_pandas_parquet_configuration_options
   0.38s setup    pyarrow/tests/test_jvm.py::test_jvm_buffer
   =============================== warnings summary ========================
   ```

wesm closed pull request #2407: ARROW-3026: [Python] [Plasma] Only run Plasma unit tests with valgrind under Python 3.6
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2407
 
 
   

This is a PR merged from a forked repository.
As GitHub hides the original diff on merge, it is displayed below for
the sake of provenance:

As this is a foreign pull request (from a fork), the diff is supplied
below (as it won't show otherwise due to GitHub magic):

diff --git a/.travis.yml b/.travis.yml
index f8f96ac080..940a96061e 100644
--- a/.travis.yml
+++ b/.travis.yml
@@ -80,7 +80,11 @@ matrix:
     - $TRAVIS_BUILD_DIR/ci/travis_build_parquet_cpp.sh
     # Build Arrow Java to test the pyarrow<->JVM in-process bridge
     - $TRAVIS_BUILD_DIR/ci/travis_script_java.sh
+    # Only run Plasma tests with valgrind in one of the Python builds because
+    # they are slow
+    - export PLASMA_VALGRIND=0
     - $TRAVIS_BUILD_DIR/ci/travis_script_python.sh 2.7
+    - export PLASMA_VALGRIND=1
     - $TRAVIS_BUILD_DIR/ci/travis_script_python.sh 3.6
     - $TRAVIS_BUILD_DIR/ci/travis_upload_cpp_coverage.sh
   # [OS X] C++ & Python w/ XCode 6.4
diff --git a/ci/travis_script_python.sh b/ci/travis_script_python.sh
index 53dd36cda9..ebdd5de693 100755
--- a/ci/travis_script_python.sh
+++ b/ci/travis_script_python.sh
@@ -124,9 +124,7 @@ python -c "import pyarrow.parquet"
 python -c "import pyarrow.plasma"
 python -c "import pyarrow.orc"
 
-if [ "$ARROW_TRAVIS_VALGRIND" == "1" ]; then
-  export PLASMA_VALGRIND=1
-fi
+echo "PLASMA_VALGRIND: $PLASMA_VALGRIND"
 
 # Set up huge pages for plasma test
 if [ $TRAVIS_OS_NAME == "linux" ]; then

fields.description: We are running these tests multiple times under valgrind. If there is a memory leak or invalid memory access, or is highly likely to be present in both Python 2.7 and 3.x
fields.summary: [Plasma] Only run Plasma Python unit tests under valgrind once instead of twice in CI
